title: Real Fucking Nice Client
body: Champ select loads then half the time client just fucking closes and how much lp have i lost by this shit now? A fucking ass ton. Ever since this patch this has been happening without even a god damned bug splat report. I'm fucking tired of this. I'm winning my games but losing all my lp cuz this mother fucking client shits its face every other hour. ok? Thanks for zero help on this.

replies.body:
Crashes without an error are typically the result of your client dropping its connection to the server due to instability. There are a number of network factors both locally and along your ISP routing that could influence this. My recommendation is to work through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), which goes over the most frequent fixes for this issue.

Let me know if you still have issues with this after working through that guide.
